data.name: AIO
data.description:
AIO VR is a multiplayer, sci-fi inspired looter shooter with tons of mini games included!

Battle your way through an army of mechs with an array of different weapons, including Pistols, Bows, Assault Rifles, Uzis', Sniper Rifles, Shotguns and Rocket Launchers.

Level up your equipment or find new gear with randomised loot drops allowing you to defeat harder enemies!

Change your appearance with countless combinations of armour and weapons so you can really make yourself stand out.

Play the way you want with unlockable skills and elements to inflict deadly damage.

Jump into the action solo or team up with your friends to take down the enemy and prove you've got what it takes!

Jump into the Arcades to play mini games and earn Arcade Tickets.

Compete in a PVP Laser tag against your friends to prove your the best.

So what are you waiting for? Join today and bring glory to AIO Inc...or die trying!

New content added regularly! For the latest update notes: http://www.aio-vr.com/news

changelog.change_log: Updated some visuals in the main room, placed in the merchant and VIP NPC's and fixed a few minor bugs.

Christmas is the time for giving, and boy is there a ton under the christmas tree this year!

OMG IT'S CHRISTMAS!
The player area is now all festive and jolly!
New outfit merchant that now offers limited edition weapon and amours appearances.
This months outfits are all Christmassy!
You can now double jump, because Christmas does make you jump with joy!

New Game Mode - PVP Laser Tag!
Play with up to 3 other friends in a red vs blue laser tag! Earn points by shooting the other team or destroying their base! The laser tag arena is full of boosts and penalties to give you that edge against the other team!
This game gives you Arcade tickets as a reward. 

New Player Area - Arcade!
A new area in the player area is now available, the arcade! This currently has a retro style shoot em up game, where you and up to 3 other friends can choose a gun and shoot the targets! Shoot the targets that match your opposing friends colours to deduct points from them, or hit your own to gain double points!
This game gives you arcade tickets as a reward.

 Arcade Tickets!
Arcade tickets can be used on the ticket merchant in the player area. Currently available is:
Shoot Em Up Launcher - Appearance Only
Laser Tag Head & Body - Appearance Only
Laser Tag Pistol: An awesome appearance for your pistols that completely changes how they shoot, blasting through your enemies without stopping. 

New Weapons!
4 new weapons have been added, that's right 4!
Uzi: A super fast shooting automatic that reloads like a pistol. Mow down your enemies like the badass you are!
Sniper Rifle: Pick off your enemies from a distance using a high damage rifle, complete with laser sight. Reload just like how you do with the Assault Rifle.
Shotgun: Blast your enemies away with the shotgun, a single shot high damage but close range weapon, reload like a boss by simply moving your hand quickly after shooting.
Launcher: A rocket launcher to destroy masses of enemies in a large area. A single shot weapon that automatically reloads.

New Visuals!
There is now a much cleaner, cell shaded appearance to the game, impoving the visuals and also the peformance for both Quest 1 and Quest 2 users.
Added neon effects to hands, bodies, head and weapons. Parts of your equipement will now glow, looks awesome when it's dark!
Retro fitted the UI elements in the menu for a new retro style, which is also easier to read and use.
Altered the log in scene with a new map.

Goblins!
Keep an eye out for shifty little goblins which may appear while in a dungeon run. These little crettins will be gaurenteed to drop loot!

New Dungeon Run Map - Everfrozen!
A new style of Dungeon run map with 4 new map layouts and a boss to boot! With christmas looming, this theme is all ice!

New Enemy Types!
With the addition of the new weapons, you will now also find these enemies through the dungeon run, wielding Uzi's, snipers, shotguns and launchers!

More features for VIP's!
VIP's have had an upgrade, and now have a bunch more features:
Quick sell - You can now quick sell all items of the weapon/armour type you have selected. Simply press the quick sell at the bottom of the menu and "Yes" to confirm. This will only sell items that are not equipped and are unlocked.
Stash - Becoming a VIP gives you permnant acces to the item stash, where you can store up to 20 items of any type. You can stash items anywhere, anytime, but to take items out of the stash you must go back to the player hub.
"Missed Drops" - A machine that will store any and all loot you may have missed or not picked up while on a dungeon run. You can choose to either pick up these items or sell them directly without having to pick them up. This will be be active for your current session, so be sure to check it before you log off!

Item Modifiers!
All items now have a chance to drop with a modifier, which will boost that items base stat.

Unique Drops!
18 new droppable unique items, items that have specific skills that are unlocked from level 1 and give you that slight edge!
 A shed ton of improvements and bug fixes!
- Increased the size of the menu for easier navigation.
- Sorted the strange gaps between inventory items.
- Increased the size of the "mini me" in the menu.
- Added a clearer way to navigate weapons and armour.
- Menu will indicate if you don't have any of a particular weapon.
- You can now adjust the sound effects and music volume in the settings (This does not effect your friends mic volume).
- Added additional amounts into the smooth turn speeds.
- Added a visual ammo count for pistols.
- Decreased the chance a dark map will appear.
- You should no longer receive invites from yourself when inviting others.
- You can now swap left and right weapons using a single button click.
- New accounts will be given two pistols, an assault rifle and a bow by default.
- Bullets should travel through the menu instead of hitting thin air.
- You now transition through maps by stepping on teleporters.
- Replaced the difficaulty hallways with the easier to use portals.
- Participation rewards on the leader boards will now give you a score of at least 500.
- Upgraded the drop appearance. You now grab the floating weapon that hovers at head height rather than the image.
- Enemy health bars have been remove. Large enemies with a larger health pool will appear as "broken" at lower health ranges to indicate health amount (Bosses will keep the health bar on the HUD)
- A new larger area in the player area to show the appearance items, which now shows double the amount of items.
- There is now a mini me beside the appearance station to better help see what appearance you have equipped.
- There is now a friendly mech to help you with VIP membership.
- A merchant room, with 3 mechs. The Arcade ticket mech, the Token Mech, and the Outfitter Mech.
- Batteries from elites will now drop in the correct place.
- Cleaned up some of the window map pieces from the Brey maps.
- Weapon skill indicators are now on the health battery, indicated for the controller your are holding that weapon in (A skill ready on a weapon in the left hand controller will be on the left side of the health battery).
- Fixed an issue where it wasn't giving you a warning when body inventory will full.
- Fixed issue where equipment slots were not updating when we opening the menu.
- You can now auto login, changable in the settings menu.
- You can now "lock" your items, to stop them being accidently sold.
- Fixed the issue where selling an item did not refresh the item list.
- You can now level up items much faster using + or - buttons.
- There is now a help section in the menu.
- Brey Boss (Orichimaru) has been update to fit the newer graphics style and make it more interesting.
